1: Shout joyfully to Yahweh, all the earth.\q
2:
Serve Yahweh with gladness;\q come before his presence with joyful singing.


\q
3:
Know that Yahweh is God;\q he made us, and we are his.
\q We are his people and the sheep of his pasture.


\q
4:
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving\q and into his courts with praise.
\q Give thanks to him and bless his name.
\q
5: For Yahweh is good; his covenant faithfulness endures forever\q and his truthfulness through all generations.
